page.title: 05HORSE TRAINER AT HARTHILL
page.content: We went to interview a local man who is a horse trainer. His house is a nice little cottage, it has got hills all around it, it is very sheltered, he trains showjumpers, hunters and eventers. He likes to start breaking or training in September so that the horse would be ready for the spring and the shows. He has been riding horses or ponies since he was eleven years old. He said that people were becoming more interested in horses and ponies because it was all part of the leisure business.Sometimes he rides for pleasure in the hills. At one time he had 12 foals, he has got 7 horses at the moment.His favourite training is showjumping, he also keeps some cows to add to his income.
